sentences.sContent: How would you handle being locked in the back of a cab while the driver hurled abuse at you?
sentences.sCn: 如果你被锁在出租车后座又遭司机谩骂，你会怎么办？

synos.tran: 丢下；用力投掷；愤慨地说出

remMethod.val: 不要大声斥责(hurl)孩子， 以免伤害(hurt)他

trans.tranOther: If you hurl abuse or insults at someone, you shout insults at them aggressively
